name: Configure and Target Creation Permissions Restricted to system admin
precondition:
Requires a sandbox instance of Zendesk with an oAuth 2 application configured.

- No Support yet for RN mobile apps

inline.description:
1. Create a test user who has a member role in Mattermost
2. Create or Locate a user in Zendesk whohas an Admin role
3. Login as the user from step 1.
4. Use the /zendesk connect command to connect as the Zendesk user from step 2.
inline.expectedResult: Member in Mattermost is connected as as an Admin in Zendesk

- Disconnect and Help options are visible
- Subscribe command is visible
- Create Target is not available to member users in Mattermost (regardless of their Zendesk role)
- Configure is not available to member users in Mattermost (regardless of their Zendesk role)

inline.description: As a Mattermost sysadmin, promote the test user to a system admin in Mattermost

Login to Mattermost as a test user who is now a sys admin
(or change channels to get fresh bindings if your session is already active)
inline.expectedResult: Test user is logged in to Mattermost and still connected to Zendesk

- Disconnect and Help options are visible
- Subscribe command is visible
- Create Target is available to sysadmin users in Mattermost (regardless of their Zendesk role)
- Configure is available to sys admin users in Mattermost (regardless of their Zendesk role)
